SELECT
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u WHERE 1=1 AND u.mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT , (SELECT a.name FROM trains.sys_area AS a where a.id = u.province ) AS province, (SELECT a.name FROM trains.sys_area AS a where a.id = u.city ) AS city, (SELECT a.name FROM trains.sys_area AS a where a.id = u.district ) AS district FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u WHERE 1=1
AND u.mobile LIKE '%'||#{mobile }||'%' CONCAT('%', #{mobile }, '%')
AND u.nickname LIKE '%'||#{nickname}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
AND u.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.reg_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startRegtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.reg_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endRegtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.last_login,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startLastlogin},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.last_login,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endLastlogin},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND ( u.district = #{district } or u.city = #{district } or u.province = #{district } )
AND u.last_login IS NULL
AND u.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY u.reg_time DESC
